ImplementedSecurityControls.TimeLock: The Collect function uses now > acc.unlockTime to enforce a time lock before withdrawals can occur.
ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: There is no owner-only access control or privilege separation implemented, meaning any user can interact with key functions like Put and Collect.

FallbackFunctionality.FallbackBehavior: The fallback function calls the Put function with an unlock time of 0, allowing deposits when ether is sent directly to the contract.
